summary: The module defines a utility class that groups assorted MAPDL helper methods not covered by the main documentation, offering simple verification and other convenience operations for interacting with ANSYS MAPDL.
business_intent: To provide end‑users of the ANSYS MAPDL Python API with extra, easy‑to‑use utilities that aid in validating inputs and performing common auxiliary tasks, thereby improving workflow robustness and developer productivity.
